snippet.title: ROBOCOP (ATARI ST - FULL GAME)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Robocop (un-emulated) for the Atari ST, a true classic from the golden era of Atari ST gaming which should not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1988

Not exactly a brilliant conversion for a 16-bit, just like the Amiga version with tinnier music, the game is ok but sadly has a huge border around a small play area screen, as I said not exactly a work of art conversion.
I have used the infinite energy trainer so I could upload the game in full for your viewing pleasure.

I hope all you Atari ST fans enjoy this upload.

A huge thanks goes out to the following two guys for supplying me the game for my Atari ST:
James: http://www.retrorabble.com (Retro Game Site).
Fred (Zorro 2) from Atari-Forum.com.

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/v...), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the Atari ST and it's cool games alive!!!
